transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hi.
Speaker B: Hello. Yeah, hello, you were speaking with Jia?
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah, that's me.
Speaker B: Yeah, hi, this is Sheikha from Amber. How are you?
Speaker A: Sorry, I can't hear. Could you say again?
Speaker B: Yeah, I'm calling Mambo student.
Speaker A: Yeah, that's me. It's round you. It's right here. That's what you're calling for?
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah, we had a discussion on WhatsApp. Like I have suggested you few option regarding your stay in London. So did you review those options?
Speaker A: I think because currently I live in the uk, so I think two days later I will give a confirmation. Because currently there's lots of choice alternatively so and I in the uk, so I could not promise that have a confirmation.
Speaker B: I'm so sorry, I'm unable to hear you. Could you please repeat yourself? Like what exactly have you said?
Speaker A: That just two days later I will give a confirmation on WhatsApp. Yeah.
Speaker B: Oh, confirmation in terms of your. In terms of accommodation or in terms of admission?
Speaker A: In terms of my choice, whether I which one will I choose or I just reject. I will give a confirmation of that.
Speaker B: Okay, so you haven't finalized your university yet?
Speaker A: Not right now, but it's still something has to be. Yeah.
Speaker B: Okay, no worries. I have just texted you on a WhatsApp. Unfortunately due to some network issue, I'm unable to hear you properly. So it would be better if you can just ping me on the WhatsApp about your update.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay, so. So if any further information just Check on the WhatsApp. Because currently I visit in the UK, so all of the things I can't just communicate. Well. Yeah.
Speaker B: Okay, sure.
Speaker A: Thank you.
Speaker B: No worries, no worries. Thank you so much for the update. I'll get.
Speaker A: 078-580-93453 is busy. Just leave.
